meanings.definition: Consisting of or involving multiple characters.
meanings.sent1: The movie had a multicharacter storyline with many different personalities.
meanings.sent2: The novel featured a multicharacter cast, each with their own unique traits.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see how the multicharacter play unfolded on stage.
meanings.sent4: Her multicharacter personality made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was a multicharacter masterpiece, showcasing various figures.

meanings.definition: Having or displaying multiple characteristics or qualities.
meanings.sent1: The multicharacter dessert was both sweet and savory.
meanings.sent2: The multicharacter building combined modern design with traditional elements.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to watch the multicharacter robot perform different tasks.
meanings.sent4: Her multicharacter skills made her a valuable asset to the team.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a multicharacter paradise, blooming with a variety of flowers.
